content: 96 sts multiple of 12 crown for 90 sts multiple of 10 cr1 ssk k8 x 9 c1 ssk k10 x 8 cr2 *sl2 p1 sl1 x 3 p1 repeat from * to end c2 *sl2 p1 sl1 x 4 p1 repeat from * to end cr3 ssk k7 to end c3 ssk k9 to end cr4 sl1 p1 to end of row c4 sl1 p1 to end of row cr5 ssk k6 to end cr6 *sl2 p1 sl1 x 2 p1 repeat from * to end then continue following from row cr1 in the cr7 ssk k5 to end left column but you will have 8 repeats not 9 cr8 sl1 p1 to end of row and you will finish with 8 sts cr9 ssk k4 to end cr10 *sl2 p1 sl1 x 1 p1 repeat from * to end cr11 ssk k3 x 9 cr12 sl1 p1 to end of row cr13 ssk k2 to end cr14 *sl2 p1 repeat from * to end cr15 ssk k1 to end cr16 sl1 p1 to end of row cr17 *ssk repeat from * to end you will have 9 sts remaining finishing pull the end through the remaining stitches to secure no need to block sew in your yarn ends if you do it neatly the hat can be reversible 2 different sides © ashcroft-hempsall 2017 - for personal non-commercial use only
